data.name: Gravity Runner Demo
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST GRAVITY RUNNER

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1642640/


About the Game



Run from an ever growing black hole through different synthwave worlds. The black hole causes unstable gravity in every world, making it a challenge to escape.



Collect cassette tapes to power up your jumps and move through worlds easier. The more tapes you collect in a row, the longer the power up lasts.
data.about_the_game:
Run from an ever growing black hole through different synthwave worlds. The black hole causes unstable gravity in every world, making it a challenge to escape.



Collect cassette tapes to power up your jumps and move through worlds easier. The more tapes you collect in a row, the longer the power up lasts.
data.short_description: Gravity Runner is a physics based 3D Platformer/Runner with a killer synthwave soundtrack. Make your way through retro synthwave worlds, filled with challenging gravity anomalies to escape an ever growing black hole.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
